ar.com.hjg.pngj

Class PngReaderByte

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.pngdecoder.PngReader
      • com.bumptech.glide.pngdecoder.PngReaderByte
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PngReaderApng

    public class PngReaderByte
extends PngReader
    Trivial extension of PngReader that uses ImageLineByte

    The factory is set at construction time. Remember that this could still be changed at runtime.

    • Field Summary
